Anomaly Specific Attributes.Anomaly Type: Anomaly Type(Anomaly Type: Physical, Behavioral or Environmental)
Anomaly Specific Attributes.Sudden Change: Sudden Change (Sudden Change: Appearance of new objects, Disappearance of objects, Sudden behavior changes)
Anomaly Specific Attributes.Normalcy Deviation: Normalcy Deviation(Normalcy Deviation: How much does the event deviate from the expected behavior in the scene)
Anomaly Specific Attributes.Impact: Impact(Impact: On scene, on actors, on objects)
